edits.oldString:
No Red Flags Identified

Patient can proceed to targeted ME/CFS, Long COVID, or POTS assessment. Consider basic metabolic panel if not done recently.
edits.newString:
{t.redFlag.results.noRedFlags}

Patient can proceed to targeted ME/CFS, Long COVID, or POTS assessment. Consider basic metabolic panel if not done recently.

edits.oldString: Clinical Decision Support
edits.newString: {t.redFlag.results.clinicalSupport}

edits.oldString: • Expedite workup due to high-priority red flags • Consider same-day or next-day evaluation • Hold off on ME/CFS/POTS assessment until red flags ruled out
• Complete recommended tests within 1-2 weeks • Can proceed with stand-test if cardiovascular red flags absent • Re-evaluate based on test results
• Proceed with routine screening labs • Can continue with ME/CFS/Long COVID/POTS assessment • Consider 4-6 week follow-up for test results
